mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, STAR, R.COUNT(*), FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "PRODUCT_IMG" FROM PRODUCT P JOIN ATTACHMENT_PRODUCT ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_PNO) JOIN REVIEW R USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
